string  param,
ref List< Exception >  caught

Executes the specified ReadConfig method in an exception-safe environment.

Parameters:
confread The ReadConfig method.
param The parameter passed to the ReadConfig method.
caught A list filled which will be filled with the exceptions caught inside the method.
